claim_card.claim: As J approaches a plateau J*, effective diffusion/rewiring capacity declines; if J is driven beyond J*, the system undergoes rapid Ψ reconfiguration (an avalanche-like regime event).
claim_card.test_hook: Using any J proxy family, test (i) diffusion proxies decline as J→J*, and (ii) crisis hazard rises sharply when J exceeds the estimated plateau.
